headline: Did Walmart’s RFID Partnership Just Shift Avery Dennison’s (AVY) Fresh Food Innovation Narrative?
summary: Walmart recently announced a collaboration with Avery Dennison to expand the use of RFID technology in fresh food categories, targeting reduced food waste and improved inventory management across bakery, meat, and deli departments. This partnership signals a push toward greater supply chain transparency and efficiency, highlighting growing retailer demand for advanced digital identification solutions in perishable goods. We will examine how Avery Dennison’s expanded RFID collaboration with...
